node.description: Delay mode: 0=manual delay setting, 1=automatic delay setting (default 0)
Delay set: write 0 then 1 to this in manual mode to set the delays chosen in delay_in and delay_offset.
Bypass IOBUF: 0=use data from IO pin, 1=use data from input stream (default 0)
Tristate IOBUF: 0=drive data to IO pin, 1=keep IO pin in high-impedance state (default 0)
Write 1 to save current counter values
Delay in: 9-bit delay to use in manual mode
Delay offset: offset between P and N side to use in manual mode for bit-error monitoring
Count the number of bits seen
Count the number of bits that didn't match between P and N side
Delay out: 9-bit delay actually in use right now by P side
Delay out N: in manual mode: delay used by N side; in automatic mode: size of the eye of zero bit errors
